eventMessage.what_happened_in_slovenia.a: §6§l§oThe Wither Storm is not completely dead.
§6§l§oIts residual power escaped to the Overworld, becoming a crippled Wither.
eventMessage.what_happened_in_slovenia.n: §6§l§oYou have killed the wither. Share Nether Star with your friends to sync their progress with yours!
§6§l§oThe Wither Storm is dead completely, and its power spread wildly in the final battle, infecting the entire world.
eventMessage.what_happened_in_slovenia.s: §6§l§oThe game has entered the Withering Storm phase. Now, all players have a probability of contracting the Wither Sickness debuff when hurt
info.what_happened_in_slovenia.vulcane:
§5AoA resource RAGE will be set to 100 when you are hurt.
Hold your vulcane (both mainhand or offhand should work) and right click to attack the mob that hurt you (you don't need to aim your vulcane at it).
he true damage ignores the vanilla damage immunity.
info.what_happened_in_slovenia.fertilise: §5When a crop is grown on Fertilised Farmland, it will give 1 extra of the crop item when harvested. Fertilised Farmland does not affect the amount of seeds gained when harvesting, nor does it affect 'seedless' crops (Potatoes, Carrots, etc.).
info.what_happened_in_slovenia.formidibo: §5High-end ingredients often only require simple cooking: put it down and ignite it with Flint and Steel!
info.what_happened_in_slovenia.for_storm: §5§l§oThis piece of equipment exists to defeat the Wither Storm
info.what_happened_in_slovenia.nowhere_p: §5§l§oAfter returning to the overworld, you will not be able to return to this dimension. It's a whole new world outside.
info.what_happened_in_slovenia.puzzle_ma: §5§l§oYou can only play games in Celeve
info.what_happened_in_slovenia.golden_ap: §5§l§oCan be used to mitigate Wither Sickness (a debuff that gradually lowers the player's health cap)
info.what_happened_in_slovenia.dragonste: §2When taking damage, if your dragon is around for 100*100*100 range centered on you, you have a 30% chance of being immune to it
info.what_happened_in_slovenia.bagofyurt: §5§l§oShift and right-click to save chests. Can't target other kinds of blocks.
